item.title: Why Delegation is the Secret Sauce of Leadership | eaHELP - Virtual Assistants
item.description:

If you're considering hiring a Virtual Assistant, chances are you've already embraced a decentralized team model, or you're well on your way. A decentralized team comes with a set of unique challenges - when you're not in the same building, how can you create a healthy culture of agility and speed?

item.title: Embracing Upward Leadership | eaHELP - Virtual Assistants

Do you believe that anyone at any level can be a leader? We do! We believe our Virtual Executive Assistants (VEA) are primed to "lead up." While anyone in any role can embrace leading up, today we want to talk about how our amazing team of VEA's can actively pursue this type of leadership.
